name: Battle Ship
description:
The nuclear war tore the space and rule of physics, destroyed 70% of the Earth and caused the Moon to mutate into a magical monster. As one of few people left, pilot the spaceship, carry the last few guns on the Earth, go to the universe to fight against the Moon, you are the last hope of mankind.

Controls

W - fire minigun

A/D - fire pistol

S - fire rifle

R+R - reloading

Left Mouse Click - fire shotgun

This game was created for the GitHub Game Off game jam.

Music by Eric Matyas www.soundimage.org

Moon art from https://helianthus-games.itch.io/pixel-art-planets

Please download PC build for better sound quality.
